ARABIC: قُلْ بِفَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ وَبِرَحْمَتِهِۦ فَبِذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَفْرَحُوا۟ هُوَ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّا يَجْمَعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'It is the favour of Allah and His mercy that should be the cause of their rejoicing. That is better than anything they accumulate.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "It is the blessing and mercy of God; so rejoice in it. It is better than all that you amass."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Tell them (O Prophet!): 'Let them rejoice in Allah's grace and mercy through which this (Book) has come to you. It is better than all the riches that they accumulate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), tell them, "To be happy with the favors and mercy of God is better than whatever you accumulate".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say, “Upon Allah’s munificence and upon His mercy – upon these should the people rejoice”; that is better than all their wealth and possessions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "In the bounty of Allah, and in His mercy; therein let them rejoice." That is better than what (the wealth) they amass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: In the grace of Allah and in His mercy-- in that they should rejoice; it is better than that which they gather.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'In the bounty of God, and His mercy -- in that let them rejoice; it is better than that they amass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy: therein let them rejoice. It is better than what they hoard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "In the grace and mercy of God let them rejoice, for these are better than the worldly riches which they hoard."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: in the grace of Allah and in His mercy--therein let them therefore rejoice: far better it is than that which they amass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘In Allah’s grace and His mercy—let them rejoice in that! It is better than what they amass.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "In the bounty of Allah. And in His Mercy,- in that let them rejoice": that is better than the (wealth) they hoard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: "In the Bounty of Allah, and in His Mercy (i.e. Islam and the Quran); -therein let them rejoice." That is better than what (the wealth) they amass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'In the Bounty of Allah and His Mercy let them rejoice, it (the Koran) is better than that which they hoard'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “In God’s grace and mercy let them rejoice. That is better than what they hoard.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy - in that let them rejoice; it is better than what they accumulate."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:58] Say: ‘In the bounty of God, [that is] Islam, and in His mercy, the Qur’ān, in that, bounty and mercy, let them rejoice: it is better than what they hoard’, in this world (read yajma‘ūn, ‘they hoard’, and tajma‘ūn, ‘you hoard’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 219 (Say) Muhammad, to your Companions: (In the bounty of Allah) in the Qur'an with which Allah has honoured you (and in His mercy) the religion of Islam, which Allah has given you success to follow: (therein) i.e. in the Qur'an and Islam (let them rejoice. It is better) i.e. the Qur'an and Islam (than what they hoard) is better than what the Jews and idolaters amass of wealth.
